# defi-agents

> DeFi agent definitions JSON API + MCP - Production-ready agents for Web3, crypto trading, portfolio management, and blockchain automation. MCP compatible.

## Links

- Repository: https://github.com/nirholas/defi-agents
- Author: https://github.com/nirholas
- Full documentation: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nirholas/defi-agents/main/llms-full.txt
